plot: A private detective investigates a cold case , which is the first registered murder case in Kerala, after 50 years.
title: Paleri Manikyam: Oru Pathirakolapathakathinte Katha
plot_es: A private detective investigates a cold case , which is the first registered murder case in Kerala, after 50 years.
plot_en: A private detective investigates a cold case , which is the first registered murder case in Kerala, after 50 years.
